vidis.data
Class AUserNode

java.lang.Object
  vidis.data.mod.AUserComponent
      vidis.data.AUserNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserComponent, IUserNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
BullyElectionAlgorithmNode, DemoNode, FloodNode, VarTestNode, VectorClockAlgorithmNode
public abstract class AUserNode
extends AUserComponent
implements IUserNode

abstract user node represents a node by a user; module writers should use this class to write their own node

Author:
dominik

getVariable

public final AVariable getVariable(String identifier)
Description copied from interface: IUserComponent
This function can be used to retrieve a user-scope set variable from the Simulator. If you specified a variable in the .msim configuration file you will retrieve it here as a String
